attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Banks have lowered interst rates on ISA accounts to below other savings account rates.  They are taking from customers the 'tax free' incentive.
Banks should be forced to pay normal savings interest rates by the government. This will protect customers and the tax incentive provided by govenment to encourage saving.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
